name: pollen-puff
flavor_text: The user attacks the enemy with a pollen puff that explodes. If the target is an ally, it gives the ally a pollen puff that restores its HP instead.
effect_text_extend: If the target is an opponent, inflicts regular damage.  If the target is an ally, heals the target for 50% of its max HP.
effect_text_simple: Damages opponents, but heals allies for 50% of their max HP.
